nidānakathā： nidānakathā（thī）
နိဒါနကထာ（ထီ）
[nidāna+kathā]
[နိဒါန+ကထာ]

Nidānakathā：The introductory chapter of the Jātaka Commentary．

It gives the story of the Buddha in three sections：

the Dūre-nidāna from the time of his birth，as Sumedha，up to his birth in the Tusita world； the Avidūre-nidāna from his death in Tusita and his birth as Siddhattha，son of Suddhodana，up to his Enlightenment； and the Santike-nidāna， which contains his story up to the dedication of Jetavana by Anāthapindika．J．i．1 94．

nidānakathā：နိဒါနကထာ（ထီ）
[နိဒါန+ကထာ]
နိဒါန်းကို ဖွင့်ဆိုရာဖြစ်သော စကားရပ်။
